com.code10.kts.controller

Class TopicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code10.kts.controller.TopicController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/buildings/{buildingId}/meetings/{meetingId}/topics")
public class TopicController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing meeting's topics.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @PostMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.hasAccessTo(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity create(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   long meetingId,
                                                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                   TopicCreateDto topicCreateDto)
        POST /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/meetingID/topics Creates a new topic for a building.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        meetingId - building's meeting ID
        topicCreateDto - DTO with topic's information
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with created topics's ID

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                       long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                       long meetingId,
                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                       long id)
        DELETE /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/meetingID/topics/ID Deletes a meeting's topic.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        meetingId - building's meeting ID
        id - meeting's topic ID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity

      • findAll

        @GetMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.hasAccessTo(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findAll(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                   long meetingId,
                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        GET /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/meetingID/topics Gets all meeting's topics.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        meetingId - building's meeting ID
        pageable - page number
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with list of all meeting's topics

      • findById

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.hasAccessTo(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long meetingId,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long id)
        GET /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/meetingID/topics/ID Gets a meeting's topic by its ID.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        meetingId - building's meeting ID
        id - meeting's topic ID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with meeting's topic matching ID

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.isSupervisorOf(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity update(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    long meetingId,
                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                    long id,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                    TopicUpdateDto topicUpdateDto)
        PUT /api/buildings/buildingID/meetings/meetingID/topics/ID Updates an existing meeting's topic.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        meetingId - building's meeting ID
        id - meeting's topic ID
        topicUpdateDto - DTO with topic's updated information
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with updated topics
